definitions.definition: An iron or steel bar , often with a flattened end which may also be hook-shaped, to be used as a lever to manually force things apart.
An electrical circuit that prevents an overvoltage from causing damage.
A type of cocktail made with only Crown Royal whiskey and lemon lime soda .

main_definition: An iron or steel bar , often with a flattened end which may also be hook-shaped, to be used as a lever to manually force things apart.
